short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that scans the current site for previous data breaches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that allows you to check the current website you are in to see if previous data breaches have occurred. The extension is powered by the haveibeenpwned api
